items.question: What happens after my 14-day free trial ends?
items.answer: After your trial, you'll be prompted to choose a paid plan to continue using the service. Your data and configurations will be saved. If you don't upgrade, your account will be paused.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, processed securely through Stripe.
